prompt: Will we receive our February salary as usual or should we wait for next month?
completion: Your February salary will be paid on time, as usual. There are no delays or changes to the payment schedule.

prompt: Can we expect to receive a house of one for each employee this month or will it be delayed?
completion: There are no plans to distribute houses to employees this month. If there are any changes or updates to this, you will be informed.

prompt: Is the compensation package retroactive since January 2020?
completion: Yes, the compensation package is retroactive since January 2020, meaning that any missed or delayed payments will be included in future payments.

prompt: Until when will you be paying equity and bonuses?
completion: Equity will be paid until December 2021. There is currently no information on whether bonuses will be paid in January 2022.

prompt: Will the new engine (V9.0) be implemented in February 2022?
completion: Yes, the new engine (V9.0) will be implemented in February 2022, and any changes or updates will be communicated to all employees beforehand.
